subject: Soccer
Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: Manchester United has recruited 9-year-old Rhain Davis after his grandfather sent a DVD to the team that showed the boy playing for an under-10 team in Brisbane, Australia.
snippet: Manchester United has recruited 9-year-old Rhain Davis after his grandfather sent a DVD to the team that showed the boy playing for an under-10 team in Brisbane, Australia.
